content: ds close ring chain 5 dtr in first of chain 10 at beginning of round round 04 chain 1 3 single_crochet chain 3 3 single_crochet in same place as join * in next chain 10 space work 3 single_crochet chain 3 3 times 3 single_crochet around in next space work 3 single_crochet chain 3 3 single_crochet chain 1 half_double_crochet in first single_crochet round 05 chain 3 bullion st in same place as join * chain 5 jdc in next two chain 3 sps chain 5 bullion st in next chain 3 space around chain 5 jdc in next two chain 3 sps chain 2 double_crochet in top of first bullion st round 06 chain 1 4 single_crochet in same space * in next chain 5 space work 4 single_crochet chain 3 4 single_crochet around 4 single_crochet in next space ch1 half_double_crochet in first single_crochet round 7 chain 1 single_crochet in same place as join chain 5 single_crochet in next chain 3 space chain 6 make ring of 10 ds p 10 ds close ring step 1 make ring of 14 ds p 14 ds close ring step 2 make ring of 10 ds p 10 ds close ring reverse slip_stitch in 6th chain st step 3 chain 5 single_crochet in next chain 3 space chain 6 step 4 make ring of 10 ds joined p in p of previous ring 10 ds close ring step 5 repeat 1 & 2 step 6 chain 5 single_crochet in next chain 3 space twice chain 6 step 7 repeat 4 step 8 repeat 1 to 7 6 more times step 9 repeat 1 to 4 once more step 10 repeat step 1 once more step 11 make ring of 10 ds joined p in p of first ring 10 ds reverse slip_stitch in 6th chain st chain 5 slip_stitch in first single_crochet fasten_off wash and lightly starch doily pin in shape note these are instructions to practice the stitches the instructions for the doily will be somewhat different reverse slip_stitch reverse slip_stitch a reverse slip_stitch is worked from right to left of work insert hook in top of specified st yo and pull through top of single_crochet joined p jp cast on required number of ds on hook insert hook in specified p to be joined yo yarn over pull thread through p picot make required number of ds and close ring bullion stitch bst yo hook specific number of times as specified in instructions insert hook in specified st yo and pull through st yo pull through all loops on hook chain 1 jdc joined double_crochet yo insert hook in specified st yo pull up yo draw through two loops on hook yo insert hook in specified st yo and pull up yo draw through two loops yo and pull through remaining loops on hook round 01 chain 8 slip_stitch in first chain st to form ring chain 1 12 single_crochet in ring slip_stitch in first single_crochet round 01
